details.address: 14231 Market Square Dr # C1, Huntersville, NC 28078
details.description: B&K Tea Cafe is a cozy and vibrant cafe, known for its wide variety of bubble teas, specialty drinks, and light snacks. We pride our company on using high-quality ingredients and providing a welcoming environment for customers to relax, socialize, or work. B&K Tea Cafe is a favorite hangout for tea enthusiasts and those looking to try creative and refreshing beverages.

raw_data.description: B&K Tea Cafe is a cozy and vibrant cafe, known for its wide variety of bubble teas, specialty drinks, and light snacks. We pride our company on using high-quality ingredients and providing a welcoming environment for customers to relax, socialize, or work. B&K Tea Cafe is a favorite hangout for tea enthusiasts and those looking to try creative and refreshing beverages.
raw_data.typical_time_spent: People typically spend up to 20 min here

posts.body: We are finally open! Come by and see us!! We are open 11AM-11PM every day of the week :) Order online below or stop by and order in-store

reviews_data.review_text: Huge tea selection, super friendly staff, this place is a sweet treat must.!❤️
awesome!
Lovely service, wonderful atmosphere, and spectacular drinks. 5/5 would recommend and will try again.
Great service and a delicious assortment of boba tea! Definitely worth a visit.

This is the best place to get your Bubble tea! I was somewhat new to Bubble tea. When I first came in, Adrian was so helpful with giving me options to try. The ingredients are fresh, the staff is friendly, and your service is quick.  Thank you Adrian, Bobby, Ethan, and Mary for always being so helpful with my orders! I highly recommend giving them a try. You'll find your new favorite place.

Absolutely trash. I brought my brother he ordered a drink and asked for LIGHT ICE ETHAN the boy making the drink filled the cup with heavy ice and barely gave him any of the drink he paid for. I called and asked for a remake and was told to come up
there for due to the mistake and when I got there ETHAN acted as if he couldn’t and wouldn’t remake the drink. Instead  of honoring his word and then suggested a refund instead of just remaking as he said on the phone. He had an attitude and acted as if we were in the wrong for coming back for a remake as he said he would do. There are to many other places charging the same if not cheaper with better quality service. WILL NEVER COME HERE AGAIN!
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Ariana, 

Thanks for your review but the full story would be nice. You placed your order on 5/3/2025 and came back in on 5/8/2025 with no messed up drink in hand, and still expected us to remake your drink when you were being hostile with our team member. We issued you a full refund for the drink, and the inconvenience, and you still left us a 1-star review. So, to be frank, I don’t think you would’ve been happy with any solution we offered you. We are sorry you had a “bad” experience when we tried our best to satisfy your needs. 

- B&K Tea Cafe Management

reviews_data.review_text: Everybody is super friendly. Great drinks!
The service was good and the drinks were really good ,Me and my friend will be back !
One of our favorite boba places in Cab County
Thus far, the BEST place in Huntersville to get boba and milk tea. Every drink I've gotten from them so far has been great. Good and friendly service also. Highly recommend!

New favorite thing! This shop is so cute. I love the oolong tea with boba, but to be fair, that is the only one I have tried. The staff is also very friendly and you can't go wrong with a "punch card" system.

Mango coconut cloud seasonal drink
Taste great
Such a cute little store, would totally recommend coming here, and the teas are actually really good

This place is really cool it even has a bunch of other snacks and food like ramen, and little snacks and they even have merch and a claw machine and they also have an outdoor area with games like connect four and even corn hole!
Very good. My fav is mango milk tea with lychee jelly or popping mango boba. Price is good.

Just tried this place for the first time today and omg, so good!! I got the mango matcha. Wish it wasn’t seasonal, but nevertheless, I can’t wait to try all the other options they have. There’s so many! The staff was very welcoming and the store was very clean. 10/10. I think I found my new boba spot :)
always great !
Some of THE best boba I’ve had! The strawberry matcha is fantastic!!

I came here on a whim after doing an errand and this place has great boba drinks and fruit teas even with almond milk or oat milk. You can play games such as the one I showed below and tons of board games and other games. They have a good rewards program and very nice staff. They have fruit jellies and cute boba tea plushies and keychains and more cute souvenirs and snacks.  It was relaxing. Too bad I live far away! I recommend it.  Prices are affordable as well.
I like it the boba taste good and I hope to come back😄
Delicious drinks and the staff is so knowledgeable and friendly! I come just about every week for my tiger milk tea fix! The rice balls on the weekends are awesome, too.
I’m so glad that they opened up a location here! Their drinks are always perfectly curated and the staff is always so kind! 10/10 recommend
The best boba tea.
Tea here is SO good! And super good vibes in the space
Love the staff and drinks here!
B&K is such a great boba joint. Both the concord and huntersville locations are amazing, so clean and I’ve enjoyed every drink I’ve had!

I got the Jasmine Milk Tea with boba and it was PHENOMENAL!!! So creamy and their boba texture is chewy, bouncy, and in between regular and mini sized. Adrian was so friendly giving great recommendations and efficiently made our drinks. The place was very clean and bright with seating inside and out. There’s games too! Will be back for sure
Such an amazing experience with immaculate drinks! Adrian is a spectacular worker, yall gotta check it out!
Yummy drinks, nice atmosphere and good service.
Y'all... How cute is this Cafe? And the drinks are amazing!!! This Cafe is open till 11pm.... The drink options are great and even has options for kids and even decaf ones too! Highly recommend
Nice staff, good environment, and great boba tea!

Such a cute addition to Huntersville and definitely needed. Friendly staff, great flavors and selection (finally a solid Taro option close by!) and they have some indoor and outdoor games and seating to enjoy. Great to hang out with some friends or the kids and enjoy a little treat! I didn’t get pictures but will add next time. We will definitely be back!
Best tea locaion in the Charlotte area. Milk alternatives! Lots of flavor options for: milk, fruit, and plain teas. Something for everyone.
Staff is always so kind and patient. The vibes inside are adorable, with other treats for purchase. Tea is always 10/10!

Loving this new spot. Awesome customer service, clean, great rewards program. Nice variety in products available. Convenient parking and location. A variety of board games available to play while in store. Good place for a hangout or study session, or to just grab and go.
Super flavorful drinks and very friendly staff members!
Didn’t take us long to become regulars. Consistently delicious! It’s our favorite bubble tea place! We are very picky bubble tea drinkers and this place is amazing!

My husband and I go to the Concord location when we’re in the area so I’m so happy there’s a closer location to us! This is the first boba shop where l don't ever have to ask for anything extra or less of. The drinks always end up exactly the way I like them! Both of the Huntersville & Concord cafes are great & clean.
Add photos & videos
Awesome!
I love everything!  Highly recommend!  A hidden gem!
Very good

Owner and employees are super friendly! Extensive menu with lots of options to customize. The only boba place I’ve been to that has dairy free milk options!! And the ability to make stuff caffeine free. Drinks came out quickly and were delicious. Oh and the mochi are so yummy!
so cute and clean inside! b&k boba is my favorite around:) I recommend the oolong milk tea! I also love to get a riceball on the weekends too.
The gentleman was very nice at the register. Gave suggestions and was patient while we decided what we wanted.
Best boba experience meeting Bobby and hearing his story. The boba was amazing and the customer service made the experience even better 🫶
Great milk tea (Highly recommend the Tiger milk tea) they got the drinks done really quickly, they had a chill atmosphere with great music, playing. I I was overall very satisfied
Very good Boubble tea and amazing customer service.

love b&k, its sooo addicting
best boba in town :D
Best boba place in the area! Super cute and nice !
Great tea! Taste super fresh and the flavors really stand out! The inside looks amazing and the colors really pop! Great place to spend some time with friends! Love the snacks and merch!
B&K is the best boba around! 🤩

The best boba you could ever have! As someone who has been drinking boba since I was a kid, B&K continuously impresses me and has become my favorite spot. There is a wide variety of drinks from unique seasonal specials to classics like brown sugar, oolong, and green tea. My favorite is the lavender milk tea and can happily say, it’s never disappointed me and no other boba shops can compare to it. I am so happy there is another location for this locally owned, North Carolina gem. B&K’s high quality drinks and wonderful service deserve to be known world-wide and im sure will be sooner than later.
great boba, rice balls, and service! would recommend checking out for sure
The most amazing boba I’ve ever had. The place was clean, and the staff was friendly and helpful. This is the only boba shop I’ll be going to from now on.
The boba drinks over here are the best!!!
The interior design of the stores is so cute and inviting! The staff are so informative and sweet whenever you have a question and the drinks are amazing!
love love love b&k with my whole heart 😍😍 they always have the best service. im so glad you guys opened this location so i can buy more boba 😈
A wonderful place to grab a sweet treat and bond with friends. Offers a wide variety of flavors to satisfy your cravings. Very friendly staff.

Such a cute Boba shop right off I-77!! I got their peppermint-coffee milk tea with boba and they have such great boba!! Their space is so cute and welcoming. I went later in the evening but I noticed outside seating which makes for a great spring/summer hangout!
B&K gets better with every location!! Seriously the best boba in the area by far.
Boba was amazing! Extremely quick service and a lot of options. My family and I love going here for a sweet treat!
Best tea in the Charlotte area!! They have an amazing selection of flavors and toppings & the atmosphere is great. I highly recommend!

Best spot in Huntersville, best spot in the Charlotte area with how it’s between the metro and a fast growing suburb like Mooresville. Strawberry matcha is my all time favorite. Don’t miss out on history
The drinks were amazing. I got the Thai and the boba was perfect. Love the atmosphere and friendly workers too!
Excited for this addition to Huntersville! Had the tigers milk and and lychee tea and both were fantastic
I mean it's good, but for a standard large boba you're looking at $7. First and last time today unfortunately.

First time coming here today. I kept spying this place from across the plaza whenever I went to Publix. 100% worth it.

I ordered the strawberry milk tea for myself and a tiger milk tea for my husband. No modifications. They were fabulous.

Strawberry milk tea was tangy and lightly sweet, with chunks of strawberry added. No artificial strawberry taste, like some places do.

Tiger milk tea was also good. Roasty, nutty, notes of caramel, and not too sweet. Better than the stuff we get from Super G Mart.

Definitely recommend this place if you'd like a treat with friendly staff and quick service!
Love it
I love b&k and all their locations! Bobby the owner is super kind and love the staff!

Loved the drinks I got. I highly recommend the fruit teas, they come with fresh cut strawberry and pineapple. Nice interior and super clean space. Had to try the self serve ramen bar, it reminded me of an Asian 7/11, cool experience. great customer service and the owner and manager are super personable and make you feel welcome
Nice to have a local boba tea spot. Clean, solid drink choices with seating
Loved the taro milk Boba!! Very cute cafe aswell
Friendly staff. Quick service. Cute shop. The menu is so big. Can’t wait to try everything.
great boba!
Yummy Boba! And a perfect location.
Love love my drink ! The owner was so nice
Best boba ever!!!! I strongly recommend coming here!
I had an amazing experience. The people were very nice and friendly and the drinks were awesome!
Love getting drinks here, the mango madness and taro are always a great treat. Mary was very kind and helpful when taking my order. My new favorite spot!
Finally a bubble tea place in Huntersville! And it’s amazing!

I recently visited B&K Tea Cafe, and I have to say, it was such a great experience! I wasn’t sure how to order at first because there are so many options—but the staff was very helpful. They walked me through choosing a flavor, suggested some great toppings (I went with the combination of lychee jelly, and black boba which was really good), and they even helped me decide how much sweetness to add.

They made everything so easy and enjoyable, and I really appreciated the personal touch. The staff was patient and friendly, making sure I got exactly what I wanted. With several locations, I’ll definitely be coming back to try other flavors!
Best Thai tea around!
I’ve literally been here several times this week. Lol so happy to have a boba cafe in the neighborhood!! Delicious drinks and awesome service!! Love it!
Literally so good every time! Best milk tea in the area.
very cute store design and super friendly! milk tea is so good!
Im so glad B&K has another location, it’s the best boba tea around - bar none! With great customer service and different flavors to choose from it is my favorite boba tea shop.

B&K Tea Cafe is hands down one of my favorite spots for boba tea! Every drink I’ve tried there has been delicious. They have a wide variety of options—whether you’re craving a classic milk tea or something fruity and refreshing, they’ve got you covered.

What I really love is how customizable everything is. They have toppings like tapioca pearls that are perfectly chewy, and lychee jelly that adds a sweet and refreshing touch. It’s fun to mix and match to create your perfect drink!😋

You can tell they care about quality because every drink tastes fresh and thoughtfully made. The staff is super friendly too, and they’re happy to help you pick something if you’re feeling overwhelmed by all the options.

If you love boba tea or just want to try something new, I highly recommend stopping by B&K Tea Cafe. It’s one of those places you’ll want to keep coming back to!
Great selection of drinks and top tier customer service. Just recently opened and thrilled to support a small business like this one! Huntersville needed this!

ALL BOBA TEA LOVERS - the best boba tea cafe in the Charlotte area! My go-to drink is always the mango madness fruit tea with boba and rainbow jelly! The customer service is always 10/10 and they are super fast! I love how their menu is not overwhelming like others and they actually take the time to explain and offer recommendations!

B&K’s makes the best bubble tea I’ve ever had! The one thing I like most about them is that they’re consistent. You can go to any of their locations and the drinks will taste amazing while service also remains top tier! Plus they have cool tumblers!
Amazing people and amazing boba teas.

You have to visit B&K if you’re a boba tea lover! They offer a variety of delicious boba drinks with great flavor combinations. The staff is super friendly and the cozy atmosphere makes it the perfect spot to hang out with friends. My personal favorite is the Tiger Milk tea!
Great drinks, clean space and the staff is always  friendly and I always receive great customer service! Highly recommend the Winter Melon milk tea with crystal boba!!
Great service and good quality drinks
Super yummy and boba is good consistency! Also discounts on Tuesdays :)

Loved my visit at this boba shop! The interior is so aesthetically pleasing, filled with cute merch and fun games. Their customer service is amazing, i always feel so welcomed with each visit. My personal favorite drink is the wintermelon, def recommend !!!
Great experience!! I love the ramen stand idea and the jasmine milk tea is very good!

I’m so glad I found B&K Tea Cafe! Their boba is always fresh and perfectly chewy, and the drinks are flavorful without being overly sweet. My personal favorite is the Strawberry Sunrise—it has the perfect balance of being rich and sweet. The staff is super friendly and makes great recommendations if you’re unsure what to try. The cafe itself is cozy and clean, making it a great spot to relax or catch up with friends. Definitely one of the best boba spots around!
10/10 service! so delicious! been to all locations, this is one of my favs

Different store, SAME consistency!! I love the atmosphere the Huntersville store provides and the customer service was amazing! All the store stick to the core values they started with since the first store opening. I will definitely be returning
Absolutely the most amazing boba tea i’ve ever had. THE VIBESS ARE IMMACULATE!!! If you have never been then you are missing out!

Boba is delicious. Was recommended their oolong milk tea during soft opening, and it was delicious! I have since returned, and have tried their other refreshers and milk tea options. Their seasonal are delicious. Their reward system is also great! Will be a long time customers.
A cool place with delicious drinks and a nice selection of different snacks and food. The service was friendly and prompt. A great option for boba close to home!
So excited to see a tea shop so close to home! We will be by often! ❤️ absolutely delicious and the team is so friendly.
The tiger milk tea is so good
The service was amazing and very fast! The menu is exceptionally large! We got our drinks very quickly and the severs were very kind! 10/10 will definitely be back!

I've already visited twice this week. The drinks I got were delicious and on point. I like how the boba isn't too soft but not quite aldente. They are small so easy to suck thru the straw without choking hazard (yeah that few miles fast when it finally gets sucked thru the straw on bigger bobas). Recommend this place for your tasty boba cravings! Can't wait to attend their grand opening this weekend!
Amazing drinks, great atmosphere, clean and fun spot! So excited it has opened.
Super friendly and helpful staff and the drinks are very good.  They take their time and make them right for you.

such a cute store with the best drinks & boba! obsessed with their taro milk tea with oat milk! customer service was GREAT and the store is very clean which is a big plus for me! can’t wait to come back :)
Such good drinks! I got the strawberry milk tea and my husband, the tropical fruit tea. Both were so good! A cute place to hang out and they’re open everyday 11-11!
Loved it!!

Brought my husband here for a much needed date night! I got a house plain tea with boba and it was very refreshing! The tea is top quality and the boba was perfect consistency. I also got the honey butter chips 10/10. They have many games to choose from so you can sit and hangout!

BEST BOBA IN HUNTERSVILLE!!! These guys are the tea experts. Top quality ingredients and super friendly staff! Highly recommend - if you’re in the area, give B&K a try!

*The drink in this photo is called Mango Madness*
they have delicious teas and the tapioca pearls have the best texture in the charlotte area!
So glad my favorite boba business opened a location in huntersville! Ill be back 🤗
Beautiful store! Loved the decor and the location. Drinks are amazing!

Love all of their locations and the drinks are always perfect and consistent! They have a food trailer in front of their soon to be Huntersville store so I’m glad I can stop by and grab some drinks before their big grand opening!!!

posts.body: We are finally open! Come by and see us!! We are open 11AM-11PM every day of the week :) Order online below or stop by and order in-store

reviews_data.review_text: Huge tea selection, super friendly staff, this place is a sweet treat must.!❤️
awesome!
Lovely service, wonderful atmosphere, and spectacular drinks. 5/5 would recommend and will try again.
Great service and a delicious assortment of boba tea! Definitely worth a visit.

This is the best place to get your Bubble tea! I was somewhat new to Bubble tea. When I first came in, Adrian was so helpful with giving me options to try. The ingredients are fresh, the staff is friendly, and your service is quick.  Thank you Adrian, Bobby, Ethan, and Mary for always being so helpful with my orders! I highly recommend giving them a try. You'll find your new favorite place.

Absolutely trash. I brought my brother he ordered a drink and asked for LIGHT ICE ETHAN the boy making the drink filled the cup with heavy ice and barely gave him any of the drink he paid for. I called and asked for a remake and was told to come up
there for due to the mistake and when I got there ETHAN acted as if he couldn’t and wouldn’t remake the drink. Instead  of honoring his word and then suggested a refund instead of just remaking as he said on the phone. He had an attitude and acted as if we were in the wrong for coming back for a remake as he said he would do. There are to many other places charging the same if not cheaper with better quality service. WILL NEVER COME HERE AGAIN!
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Ariana, 

Thanks for your review but the full story would be nice. You placed your order on 5/3/2025 and came back in on 5/8/2025 with no messed up drink in hand, and still expected us to remake your drink when you were being hostile with our team member. We issued you a full refund for the drink, and the inconvenience, and you still left us a 1-star review. So, to be frank, I don’t think you would’ve been happy with any solution we offered you. We are sorry you had a “bad” experience when we tried our best to satisfy your needs. 

- B&K Tea Cafe Management

reviews_data.review_text: Everybody is super friendly. Great drinks!
The service was good and the drinks were really good ,Me and my friend will be back !
One of our favorite boba places in Cab County
Thus far, the BEST place in Huntersville to get boba and milk tea. Every drink I've gotten from them so far has been great. Good and friendly service also. Highly recommend!

New favorite thing! This shop is so cute. I love the oolong tea with boba, but to be fair, that is the only one I have tried. The staff is also very friendly and you can't go wrong with a "punch card" system.

Mango coconut cloud seasonal drink
Taste great
Such a cute little store, would totally recommend coming here, and the teas are actually really good

This place is really cool it even has a bunch of other snacks and food like ramen, and little snacks and they even have merch and a claw machine and they also have an outdoor area with games like connect four and even corn hole!
Very good. My fav is mango milk tea with lychee jelly or popping mango boba. Price is good.

Just tried this place for the first time today and omg, so good!! I got the mango matcha. Wish it wasn’t seasonal, but nevertheless, I can’t wait to try all the other options they have. There’s so many! The staff was very welcoming and the store was very clean. 10/10. I think I found my new boba spot :)
always great !
Some of THE best boba I’ve had! The strawberry matcha is fantastic!!

I came here on a whim after doing an errand and this place has great boba drinks and fruit teas even with almond milk or oat milk. You can play games such as the one I showed below and tons of board games and other games. They have a good rewards program and very nice staff. They have fruit jellies and cute boba tea plushies and keychains and more cute souvenirs and snacks.  It was relaxing. Too bad I live far away! I recommend it.  Prices are affordable as well.
I like it the boba taste good and I hope to come back😄
Delicious drinks and the staff is so knowledgeable and friendly! I come just about every week for my tiger milk tea fix! The rice balls on the weekends are awesome, too.
I’m so glad that they opened up a location here! Their drinks are always perfectly curated and the staff is always so kind! 10/10 recommend
The best boba tea.
Tea here is SO good! And super good vibes in the space
Love the staff and drinks here!
B&K is such a great boba joint. Both the concord and huntersville locations are amazing, so clean and I’ve enjoyed every drink I’ve had!

I got the Jasmine Milk Tea with boba and it was PHENOMENAL!!! So creamy and their boba texture is chewy, bouncy, and in between regular and mini sized. Adrian was so friendly giving great recommendations and efficiently made our drinks. The place was very clean and bright with seating inside and out. There’s games too! Will be back for sure
Such an amazing experience with immaculate drinks! Adrian is a spectacular worker, yall gotta check it out!
Yummy drinks, nice atmosphere and good service.
Y'all... How cute is this Cafe? And the drinks are amazing!!! This Cafe is open till 11pm.... The drink options are great and even has options for kids and even decaf ones too! Highly recommend
Nice staff, good environment, and great boba tea!

Such a cute addition to Huntersville and definitely needed. Friendly staff, great flavors and selection (finally a solid Taro option close by!) and they have some indoor and outdoor games and seating to enjoy. Great to hang out with some friends or the kids and enjoy a little treat! I didn’t get pictures but will add next time. We will definitely be back!
Best tea locaion in the Charlotte area. Milk alternatives! Lots of flavor options for: milk, fruit, and plain teas. Something for everyone.
Staff is always so kind and patient. The vibes inside are adorable, with other treats for purchase. Tea is always 10/10!

Loving this new spot. Awesome customer service, clean, great rewards program. Nice variety in products available. Convenient parking and location. A variety of board games available to play while in store. Good place for a hangout or study session, or to just grab and go.
Super flavorful drinks and very friendly staff members!
Didn’t take us long to become regulars. Consistently delicious! It’s our favorite bubble tea place! We are very picky bubble tea drinkers and this place is amazing!

My husband and I go to the Concord location when we’re in the area so I’m so happy there’s a closer location to us! This is the first boba shop where l don't ever have to ask for anything extra or less of. The drinks always end up exactly the way I like them! Both of the Huntersville & Concord cafes are great & clean.
Add photos & videos
Awesome!
I love everything!  Highly recommend!  A hidden gem!
Very good

Owner and employees are super friendly! Extensive menu with lots of options to customize. The only boba place I’ve been to that has dairy free milk options!! And the ability to make stuff caffeine free. Drinks came out quickly and were delicious. Oh and the mochi are so yummy!
so cute and clean inside! b&k boba is my favorite around:) I recommend the oolong milk tea! I also love to get a riceball on the weekends too.
The gentleman was very nice at the register. Gave suggestions and was patient while we decided what we wanted.
Best boba experience meeting Bobby and hearing his story. The boba was amazing and the customer service made the experience even better 🫶
Great milk tea (Highly recommend the Tiger milk tea) they got the drinks done really quickly, they had a chill atmosphere with great music, playing. I I was overall very satisfied
Very good Boubble tea and amazing customer service.

love b&k, its sooo addicting
best boba in town :D
Best boba place in the area! Super cute and nice !
Great tea! Taste super fresh and the flavors really stand out! The inside looks amazing and the colors really pop! Great place to spend some time with friends! Love the snacks and merch!
B&K is the best boba around! 🤩

The best boba you could ever have! As someone who has been drinking boba since I was a kid, B&K continuously impresses me and has become my favorite spot. There is a wide variety of drinks from unique seasonal specials to classics like brown sugar, oolong, and green tea. My favorite is the lavender milk tea and can happily say, it’s never disappointed me and no other boba shops can compare to it. I am so happy there is another location for this locally owned, North Carolina gem. B&K’s high quality drinks and wonderful service deserve to be known world-wide and im sure will be sooner than later.
great boba, rice balls, and service! would recommend checking out for sure
The most amazing boba I’ve ever had. The place was clean, and the staff was friendly and helpful. This is the only boba shop I’ll be going to from now on.
The boba drinks over here are the best!!!
The interior design of the stores is so cute and inviting! The staff are so informative and sweet whenever you have a question and the drinks are amazing!
love love love b&k with my whole heart 😍😍 they always have the best service. im so glad you guys opened this location so i can buy more boba 😈
A wonderful place to grab a sweet treat and bond with friends. Offers a wide variety of flavors to satisfy your cravings. Very friendly staff.

Such a cute Boba shop right off I-77!! I got their peppermint-coffee milk tea with boba and they have such great boba!! Their space is so cute and welcoming. I went later in the evening but I noticed outside seating which makes for a great spring/summer hangout!
B&K gets better with every location!! Seriously the best boba in the area by far.
Boba was amazing! Extremely quick service and a lot of options. My family and I love going here for a sweet treat!
Best tea in the Charlotte area!! They have an amazing selection of flavors and toppings & the atmosphere is great. I highly recommend!

Best spot in Huntersville, best spot in the Charlotte area with how it’s between the metro and a fast growing suburb like Mooresville. Strawberry matcha is my all time favorite. Don’t miss out on history
The drinks were amazing. I got the Thai and the boba was perfect. Love the atmosphere and friendly workers too!
Excited for this addition to Huntersville! Had the tigers milk and and lychee tea and both were fantastic
I mean it's good, but for a standard large boba you're looking at $7. First and last time today unfortunately.

First time coming here today. I kept spying this place from across the plaza whenever I went to Publix. 100% worth it.

I ordered the strawberry milk tea for myself and a tiger milk tea for my husband. No modifications. They were fabulous.

Strawberry milk tea was tangy and lightly sweet, with chunks of strawberry added. No artificial strawberry taste, like some places do.

Tiger milk tea was also good. Roasty, nutty, notes of caramel, and not too sweet. Better than the stuff we get from Super G Mart.

Definitely recommend this place if you'd like a treat with friendly staff and quick service!
Love it
I love b&k and all their locations! Bobby the owner is super kind and love the staff!

Loved the drinks I got. I highly recommend the fruit teas, they come with fresh cut strawberry and pineapple. Nice interior and super clean space. Had to try the self serve ramen bar, it reminded me of an Asian 7/11, cool experience. great customer service and the owner and manager are super personable and make you feel welcome
Nice to have a local boba tea spot. Clean, solid drink choices with seating
Loved the taro milk Boba!! Very cute cafe aswell
Friendly staff. Quick service. Cute shop. The menu is so big. Can’t wait to try everything.
great boba!
Yummy Boba! And a perfect location.
Love love my drink ! The owner was so nice
Best boba ever!!!! I strongly recommend coming here!
I had an amazing experience. The people were very nice and friendly and the drinks were awesome!
Love getting drinks here, the mango madness and taro are always a great treat. Mary was very kind and helpful when taking my order. My new favorite spot!
Finally a bubble tea place in Huntersville! And it’s amazing!

I recently visited B&K Tea Cafe, and I have to say, it was such a great experience! I wasn’t sure how to order at first because there are so many options—but the staff was very helpful. They walked me through choosing a flavor, suggested some great toppings (I went with the combination of lychee jelly, and black boba which was really good), and they even helped me decide how much sweetness to add.

They made everything so easy and enjoyable, and I really appreciated the personal touch. The staff was patient and friendly, making sure I got exactly what I wanted. With several locations, I’ll definitely be coming back to try other flavors!
Best Thai tea around!
I’ve literally been here several times this week. Lol so happy to have a boba cafe in the neighborhood!! Delicious drinks and awesome service!! Love it!
Literally so good every time! Best milk tea in the area.
very cute store design and super friendly! milk tea is so good!
Im so glad B&K has another location, it’s the best boba tea around - bar none! With great customer service and different flavors to choose from it is my favorite boba tea shop.

B&K Tea Cafe is hands down one of my favorite spots for boba tea! Every drink I’ve tried there has been delicious. They have a wide variety of options—whether you’re craving a classic milk tea or something fruity and refreshing, they’ve got you covered.

What I really love is how customizable everything is. They have toppings like tapioca pearls that are perfectly chewy, and lychee jelly that adds a sweet and refreshing touch. It’s fun to mix and match to create your perfect drink!😋

You can tell they care about quality because every drink tastes fresh and thoughtfully made. The staff is super friendly too, and they’re happy to help you pick something if you’re feeling overwhelmed by all the options.

If you love boba tea or just want to try something new, I highly recommend stopping by B&K Tea Cafe. It’s one of those places you’ll want to keep coming back to!
Great selection of drinks and top tier customer service. Just recently opened and thrilled to support a small business like this one! Huntersville needed this!

ALL BOBA TEA LOVERS - the best boba tea cafe in the Charlotte area! My go-to drink is always the mango madness fruit tea with boba and rainbow jelly! The customer service is always 10/10 and they are super fast! I love how their menu is not overwhelming like others and they actually take the time to explain and offer recommendations!

B&K’s makes the best bubble tea I’ve ever had! The one thing I like most about them is that they’re consistent. You can go to any of their locations and the drinks will taste amazing while service also remains top tier! Plus they have cool tumblers!
Amazing people and amazing boba teas.

You have to visit B&K if you’re a boba tea lover! They offer a variety of delicious boba drinks with great flavor combinations. The staff is super friendly and the cozy atmosphere makes it the perfect spot to hang out with friends. My personal favorite is the Tiger Milk tea!
Great drinks, clean space and the staff is always  friendly and I always receive great customer service! Highly recommend the Winter Melon milk tea with crystal boba!!
Great service and good quality drinks
Super yummy and boba is good consistency! Also discounts on Tuesdays :)

Loved my visit at this boba shop! The interior is so aesthetically pleasing, filled with cute merch and fun games. Their customer service is amazing, i always feel so welcomed with each visit. My personal favorite drink is the wintermelon, def recommend !!!
Great experience!! I love the ramen stand idea and the jasmine milk tea is very good!

I’m so glad I found B&K Tea Cafe! Their boba is always fresh and perfectly chewy, and the drinks are flavorful without being overly sweet. My personal favorite is the Strawberry Sunrise—it has the perfect balance of being rich and sweet. The staff is super friendly and makes great recommendations if you’re unsure what to try. The cafe itself is cozy and clean, making it a great spot to relax or catch up with friends. Definitely one of the best boba spots around!
10/10 service! so delicious! been to all locations, this is one of my favs

Different store, SAME consistency!! I love the atmosphere the Huntersville store provides and the customer service was amazing! All the store stick to the core values they started with since the first store opening. I will definitely be returning
Absolutely the most amazing boba tea i’ve ever had. THE VIBESS ARE IMMACULATE!!! If you have never been then you are missing out!

Boba is delicious. Was recommended their oolong milk tea during soft opening, and it was delicious! I have since returned, and have tried their other refreshers and milk tea options. Their seasonal are delicious. Their reward system is also great! Will be a long time customers.
A cool place with delicious drinks and a nice selection of different snacks and food. The service was friendly and prompt. A great option for boba close to home!
So excited to see a tea shop so close to home! We will be by often! ❤️ absolutely delicious and the team is so friendly.
The tiger milk tea is so good
The service was amazing and very fast! The menu is exceptionally large! We got our drinks very quickly and the severs were very kind! 10/10 will definitely be back!

I've already visited twice this week. The drinks I got were delicious and on point. I like how the boba isn't too soft but not quite aldente. They are small so easy to suck thru the straw without choking hazard (yeah that few miles fast when it finally gets sucked thru the straw on bigger bobas). Recommend this place for your tasty boba cravings! Can't wait to attend their grand opening this weekend!
Amazing drinks, great atmosphere, clean and fun spot! So excited it has opened.
Super friendly and helpful staff and the drinks are very good.  They take their time and make them right for you.

such a cute store with the best drinks & boba! obsessed with their taro milk tea with oat milk! customer service was GREAT and the store is very clean which is a big plus for me! can’t wait to come back :)
Such good drinks! I got the strawberry milk tea and my husband, the tropical fruit tea. Both were so good! A cute place to hang out and they’re open everyday 11-11!
Loved it!!

Brought my husband here for a much needed date night! I got a house plain tea with boba and it was very refreshing! The tea is top quality and the boba was perfect consistency. I also got the honey butter chips 10/10. They have many games to choose from so you can sit and hangout!

BEST BOBA IN HUNTERSVILLE!!! These guys are the tea experts. Top quality ingredients and super friendly staff! Highly recommend - if you’re in the area, give B&K a try!

*The drink in this photo is called Mango Madness*
they have delicious teas and the tapioca pearls have the best texture in the charlotte area!
So glad my favorite boba business opened a location in huntersville! Ill be back 🤗
Beautiful store! Loved the decor and the location. Drinks are amazing!

Love all of their locations and the drinks are always perfect and consistent! They have a food trailer in front of their soon to be Huntersville store so I’m glad I can stop by and grab some drinks before their big grand opening!!!

raw_data.description: B&K Tea Cafe is a cozy and vibrant cafe, known for its wide variety of bubble teas, specialty drinks, and light snacks. We pride our company on using high-quality ingredients and providing a welcoming environment for customers to relax, socialize, or work. B&K Tea Cafe is a favorite hangout for tea enthusiasts and those looking to try creative and refreshing beverages.
raw_data.typical_time_spent: People typically spend up to 20 min here

posts.body: We are finally open! Come by and see us!! We are open 11AM-11PM every day of the week :) Order online below or stop by and order in-store
